scripts.clean: rimraf build generated unmemoized js_output abc lib app/test/build
scripts.compile:ets: npm run compile:plugin && cd src/ets && ets-tsc -p ./etsconfig.json
scripts.unmemoize:all: npm run unmemoize:runtime && npm run unmemoize:arkui-no-common && npm run unmemoize:arkui-common && npm run unmemoize
scripts.unmemoize:all:passed: npm run unmemoize:runtime && npm run unmemoize:arkui-no-common && npm run unmemoize:arkui-common && npm run unmemoize:passed
scripts.build:test: npm run unmemoize:all && npm run build:test:inc
scripts.build:test:passed: npm run unmemoize:all:passed && npm run build:test:inc
scripts.pack: npm run cli-tools:download && cd app && DEVECO_SDK_HOME=../../../arkoala-arkts/ohos-sdk/ohos-sdk ../command-line-tools/hvigor/bin/hvigorw --no-daemon --mode module -p product=default -p module=test@default assembleHar
scripts.har-arm32: npm run build:test && npm run --prefix ../../arkoala-arkts/ohos-sdk download && node scripts/build-har.mjs --name test --arch arm32 && npm run pack
scripts.har-arm64: npm run build:test && npm run --prefix ../../arkoala-arkts/ohos-sdk download && node scripts/build-har.mjs --name test --arch arm64 && npm run pack
scripts.har-universal: npm run build:test && npm run --prefix ../../arkoala-arkts/ohos-sdk download && node scripts/build-har-universal.mjs --name test && npm run pack
